actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the acquisition of land by the use of eminent domain for fish and wildlife enhancement in connection with the Garrison Diversion Unit of the Missouri River Basin project.

summary.text: Prohibits the acquisition of land by eminent domain for fish and wildlife enhancement in connection with the Garrison Diversion Unit of the Missouri River Basin project, North Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the acquisition of land by the use of eminent domain for fish and wildlife enhancement in connection with the Garrison Diversion Unit of the Missouri River Basin project.
